A C D G I M P R S 
All Classes All Packages

G

getBudget() - Method in class Card
Gets the budget of this Card for verifying if the Player has successfully acted on their part, and to determine the amount of dice to roll in the event of a bonus payout.
getCard() - Method in class Set
Gets the Card on this Set, to check the star roles that a Player can possibly attain.
getCredits() - Method in class Player
Gets the number of credits this Player currently has, used for updating that amount.
getCurrentRoom() - Method in class Player
Gets this Player's current Room, used to determine what actions this Player can take at the current time.
getDefaultTakes() - Method in class Set
Gets the default amount of takes for this Set, which is very useful for resetting the number of takes left at the end of a movie.
getDescription() - Method in class Card
Gets the description of this Card for displaying to the user.
getDollars() - Method in class Player
Gets the number of dollars this Player currently has, used for updating that amount.
getLevel() - Method in class Part
Gets the level of this Part for verifying the Player meets the minimum rank requirement.
getLine() - Method in class Part
Gets the line of this Part for displaying to the user.
getName() - Method in class Card
Gets the name of this Card for displaying to the user.
getName() - Method in class Part
Gets the name of this Part for displaying to the user.
getName() - Method in class Room
Gets the name of this Room for displaying to the user.
getNeighbors() - Method in class Room
Gets the HashSet of this Room's neighbors, for checking where the Player can move from this current Room.
getParts() - Method in class Card
Gets the HashSet of part objects associated with this Card.
getParts() - Method in class Set
Gets the HashSet of Parts associated with this Set, which is used to find all of the Players associated with them.
getPlayerOnPart() - Method in class Part
Gets the Player object currently occupying this Part, if there is one.
getPlayers() - Method in class Room
Gets the HashSet of this Room's players, for checking what Players are currently in this Room.
getRank() - Method in class Player
Gets this Players current rank, used when upgrading that rank or when checking if this Player can take a certain Part.
getSceneNumber() - Method in class Card
Gets the scene number of this Card for displaying to the user.
getScore() - Method in class Player
Gets this Player's current score, which is a combination of 5 times their rank, their dollars, and their credits.
getTakesLeft() - Method in class Set
Gets the number of takes left for this Set, to determine when a new Card should be attached to it.
getTimesRehearsedThisScene() - Method in class Player
Gets the number of times this Player has rehearsed during the current scene, used for applying the rehearsal bonus while attempting to act.
